title: Oh Ho Sanam Lyrics Dasavatharam
stanzas:
Oh Ho Sanam LyricsÂ Dasavatharam
#kamalhaasan #mahalakshmiiyer #vairamuthu

paattu un kadhile
thaenai vaakkum
paattu un kangalil
neerai vaakkum

udal boomikke pogattum
isai boomiyai aallattum

ho ho sanam
ho ho sanam okho..

kaattrai thiraikkum
saavithaan kaathu
kaadhai thirakkum
saavithan paattu

paattu un kadhile
thaenai vaakkum
paattu un kangalil
neerai vaakkum (2)

udal boomikke pogattum
isai boomiyai aallattum

kaattrai thiraikkum
saavithaan kaathu
kaadhai thirakkum
saavithan paattu

ho ho sanam
ho ho sanam okho..

nee enabadhai pollaadha
naan enbadhai
ondraakki naam seivadhu
paadalthaan

yaar nenjilum mirugathin
thol ulladhu
adhai maattri
aal seivadhu
paadalthaan..

kadavulum kadha saamiyum
pesi kollum mozhi paadalthaan

mannil naam vazhgira
kaalam konjam
vazhvil un suvadugal
engae minjum

enni paaradaa maanudaa
ennodu nee paadadaa

ho ho sanam
ho ho sanam okho..

poo pookudhe
adhan vazhvu
aezhu naattkale
aanaalum thaen
thandhuthaan pogudhe

nam vazhkaye
vazhnaalil yaar
thandhadhu
en nenjam nee vazhave
paadiven.

veelvadhu yaaraayinum
vazhvadhu naadaagattum

kaalam un udhadugal
moodum podhum
kaattru un
varigalai meendum
paadum

nee paadinaal
nallisai
un mounamum
mellisai..

ho ho sanam
ho ho sanam okho..

seo.title: Oh Ho Sanam Lyrics Dasavatharam
seo.description: Get the complete Oh Ho Sanam Lyrics Dasavatharam from Dasavatharam. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Himesh Reshammiya and sung by Kamal Haasan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Dasavatharam, Himesh Reshammiya, Kamal Haasan, Mahalakshmi Iyer, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
